infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Restyle AI needs access to your camera to take photos of items for AI-powered market analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Restyle AI needs access to your photo library to select images of items for AI-powered market analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for AI-powered item search.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for AI-powered item search.
